text: @realDonaldTrump Transition what, jackass? Your PATHETIC "governing" during the #COVID19 pandemic? Your politically motivated dismissal of charges against Flynn? #BlueWave2020 will ENSURE a transition to greatness 1-21-2021 WHEN @JoeBiden is elected to replace YOU. I doubt U leave peacefully!
